Replies.Reply: A DOZEN NEW RECRUITS step off the plane, unloading their duffel bags, looking around like only the new can look around, their hair regulation-clipped, crisp, new green fatigues fitting them like cardboard.
That what I think it is?
Hey Chris, I show you a picture of Lucy Jean?
What are you waiting for?  He ain't gonna bite you. Move out.
Tell that dipshit to get fucked.  Get that other freshmeat up here.  Gardner.
What the hell's the matter with you Taylor!  You a sorry ass motherfucker.  Fall back.
We got boo-coo movement.  3rd Battalion just got hit 15 kliks north of here.
Yeah, they had claymores strung up in the trees, blew a whole fucking platoon to pieces.  BAAD SHIT.
Yeah, they got two Lieutenants and a Captain.
Elias - you take your squad and I'll take Tex and Francis from your squad.
We move out in two-zero mikes.
Okay, let's move out.
Shut up!  Shut up - and TAKE IT!  TAKE THE PAIN!
How the hell did he get away?
Yeah, and I ain't even cheating yet.
Play Lieutenant?
Pssst!
Corpsman!
Goddamit!  Are you fucking kids ever gonna learn! Don't you understand how easy it is to die!
Check him out.
Get out of there you fuckheads move!  Move!
Put'em in the pig pen.
There's more down there.  Gimme your Willy Pete.
FIRE IN THE HOLE!
Burn it.
Where'd he get these wounds?
Ask him what the weapons are doing here?
What's the bitch saying?
Tell him he talks or I'm gonna waste more of 'em.
Go ahead, Lerner, ask him.
This his daughter, right?
Stay out of this Elias.  This ain't your show.
You're dead, you're fucking dead Elias!
You got it sir - and I can throw in plenty of eye-
Goddamit, you assholes get fucking' firepower out there!
Get Two Bravo up here.  Get me a gun.
Spread it out!  More to the flanks!  Look for a fuckin' target!
Where the fuck is red platoon!  Tell 'em to get their asses up here!  What the fuck you doin' back here Elias?  Round up your assholes and move 'em up front, we're getting chopped to shit.
Take off, but keep your radio here.
Don't tell me how to fight this fucking war, 'Lias, you go crying to fucking brigade on your time.  Out here you belong to me.  Now move.
Get that asshole O'Neill up here willya!
That fuckin' idiot!
Let's move back, link up with Three.  Let the arty do a little work.
Push Two Alpha and Two Charlie.  Tell'em to haul ass and re-group at the church.  Tell'em NOT to fire.
I'll get him.
You just haul ass too lootenant.
Where's Elias?
Didn't you hear the arty shift?  We're pulling back. Get your wounded man and get the fuck back to the church.  Get going.
NOW.  Or I'll Article 15 both your asses.  Move!
Move it, MOVE IT!
Elias is dead.  Join up with the platoon.  Move it.
Yeah.  Back about 100 metres.  He's dead, now get going, the gooks are all over the fuckin' place.
Talking 'bout killing?
Y'all experts?  Y'all know about killing?
Me I don't need that shit.  I AM reality.
Y'all loved Elias, want to kick ass, I'se here - all by my lonesome, nobody gonna know.  Five you boys 'gainst me?
Kill me.
I SHIT on all o' you.
Death?  What do you guys know about it?
So what's the problem?
Shit.  Get your boots on Martin, next time I catch you putting mosquito repellant on your fuckin' feet I'm gonna courtmartial your nigger ass.
Get me that centipede, O'Neill.
Yeah that long hairy orange and black bastard I found in the ammo crate.  I'm gonna put it in this asshole's crotch, see if he can walk.
Yeah, what is it?
I'm talking to you Red and I'm telling you no.  Get back to your position.
Bravo Two, Six.  What's the delay up there, move it out on point.  We've got a link up at Phase Line Whiskey at One Eight Zero Zero, over.
Tomorrow we're going back into that bunker complex - from the East.
Barnes, Elias eye each other and move off.
Bravo Three Alpha!  Send me a grid.  Send me a grid, over!
Bravo Three Alpha six.  How bout those rounds son? Can you adjust fire?
Three Alpha, if you can't talk, just key the handset twice over.

Silence, then a vague MURMURING - becoming clearer and clearer. It's in Vietnamese.  The radio is then bashed in, the sound like thunder in the Captain's ear.  He looks at his RTO, both of them shocked.

Bravo Two, Six!  Goddamit where the hell you plannin' to pull back to!  They're all over the perimeter.  Be advised Lieutenant, you WILL hold in place and you will FIGHT and that means YOU, Lieutenant.  Out!
Snakebite leader, Ripper Bravo Six, we're gonna need you soonest be advised I've got zips in the wire down here, over!
Roger your last Bravo Six, Snakebite lead we can't run it any closer.  We're hot to trot and packing snape and nape but we're bingo fuel.  It's your call, Six actual, Over.
You got Second Platoon Sergeant.
Yes sir -
Two Bravo, Two move it out.  Six says we're jamming 'em up back there.  Over.
How you doing Rodriguez?
BREAK IT UP!  ELIAS!  BARNES!
I didn't see anything sir.
That dink was reported to me as NVA sir by Sergeant Barnes.  Sergeant Barnes.
All right move out.
You okay?
Yeah, black ants are killers, you look sick man.  You need a little salt.

Sergeant Elias, a handsome, graceful dark-haired Indian kid of 23, the squad sergeant, is taking items out of Chris' pack - air mattress, extra unnecessary clothing, extra canteens, grenades, gas mask, books.
Easy Tex easy boy!
'Right there.
Self-preservation's the first law of nature.  Gotta learn how to work your shit Taylor.  Watch me, don't let'em go into shock.
Yeah!
Broken man?
Holy Jesus!
Right on, nothing wrong with Barnes another shot in the head wouldn't cure.
He dug it.
Bad vibes, man, I got bad vibes here.  Where are the new guys they provided us anyway.
Uh hunh.
Sure.
Yeah.
Hey Tex - you're ten minutes fast.
Junior!
Wake up!
Okay - got light duty, three days.
What you got there - beers?
Uh, looks like it?
I got light duty, Sarge.  Doctor said to take it easy couple days.
I volunteered.
And why should just the poor kids go to the war - and the college kids get away with it.
Don't feel it.
What are the heads?
What?
Yeah.
Yeah.  No pain in my neck now.  Feels good.
But what'd she actually do?
God!
Elizabeth?
Jennifer?
Where?
La Dai! La Dai! GET THE FUCK OUTTA THERE!
They're scared?  What about me!  I'm sick of this shit man, I"m sick of this shit!  They don't want us here!  Who do you think they're fighting for!  GET OUTTA THERE!
DANCE YOU ONE-LEGGED MOTHERFUCKER, DANCE!!!
LET HER GO!  YOU HEAR ME!  YOU ASSHOLE!  LET HER GO!
Where's he form?
And he still wanted to come back?
Does he have a metal plate in his head?
Where's Elias come from?
That's a nice way of putting it.
Barnes got it in for you, don't he?
And you, do you believe?
What's going on?
Who's on point?
Where's Lerner?
Oh Jesus!
Lerner!  Lerner, can you hear me man?
Gator!  Gator!
Take care of him Doc!  Please!
I'll go with you.
GET EM!!!!!
Crawford, the blond-locked California beach boy, lies on the earth, hit in a lung, having difficulty breathing, moaning in a soft undercurrent.  Chris runs up on him.
Proof's in the eyes.  When you know you know.  You were there Rhah - I know what you were thinking.  I say we frag the fucker.  Tonight.
Then what do you suggest big shot?
Fuck this shit!
You're wrong man!  Any way you cut it Rhah, Barnes is a murderer.
I was wrong.
KILL YOU MOTHERFUCKER!!!

They sent us back into the valley the next day - about 2,000 metres from Cambodia - into a battalion perimeter.  Alpha Company had been hit hard the day before by a sizeable force and Charlie Company had been probed that night.  There were other battalions in the valley, we weren't the only ones but we knew we were going to be the bait to lure them out.  And somewhere out there was the entire 141st NVA Regiment.
Who gives a shit!
Y'ever get caught in a mistake King and you just can't get out of it?
RPGs!  Shit!
Over here!
Hold it!
WHO IS IT!
No!
It's the ambush!
In here, man!  Hurry.
You go.
Oh no!
There!
Out of the hole!  Fast!
DIE YOU MOTHERFUCKERS!!! YAAAAAAAAA!!!
DIE YOU MOTHERFUCKERS!!!
Barnes!
Nooooooooo!
Yeah.  How 'bout you?
You bet.
You're humping way too much, troop, don't need half this shit.  I'll haul it for you but next time you check it out with me okay?
Hold it up.
Lerner, you'd choke to death on it.
I thought it was O'Neill's turn tonight.
They don't know shit Barnes, and chances are we gonna run into something.
Hey O'Neill why don't you cool it, you don't have to be a prick everyday of your life, you know.
Tex you got Junior and Taylor here on your position.
'Case somethin' happens to you, you get separated or lost don't yell out okay.  Sit tight.  We'll get to you.
Blood trail just keeps going and going but no body.
Fuckers returned fire soon as we lit 'em up.  Hard core fuckin' NVA.  They got their shit together.
Knock it off!  We got two men need attention here. Police up your extra ammo and frags, don't leave nothing for the dinks.  Hoyt, Junior, carry Gardner.
Man'd be alive if he'd had a few more days to learn something.
Put your mouth on that.
First time?
Then the worm has definately turned for you man.
Feel good?
Feelin' good's good enough.
Hey Crutcher.  I hear you got a Dear John from your gal.  Told you she wasn't getting 'nuff from you.
What'd you say her name was again?
Daisy Mae!  What Daisy Mae look like Crutcher?
The look on his face ensnares all of them, except perhaps Rhah.
No whorehouse man.  On the beach.
Yeah, sure.  She walked right by me.  Long black hair, tits swinging.  Ass like French bread.  Legs don't end right.
So I'm thinking to myself - Elias you walk away from this, you gonna regret this the rest of your natural life.  So I go after her, follow her down the beach. You know find out if she is what she is.
Well she was picking up her kids.
No, dat ain't dat.
Like two hogs in heat.  Boy.
What didn't she do.  She fucked the living shit outta me, that's what she did!
She was a crossbreed, Chinese and Polish.
Yeah - and has blonde hair and almond-shaped eyes.
Dawn!  That was it!
Tell Six we need engineers here, this pos. is crawling with traps.
BARNES!!
WHAT THE FUCK YOU DOING!
YOU AIN'T A FIRING SQUAD, YOU PIECE OF SHIT!!
YOU - you're going to fuckin' jail, buddy, you ain't getting away with this one!!!!!
Why the fuck didn't you do something Lieutenant!
You know what I'm talking about!
Get outta here.
I did.
Barnes believes in what he's doing.
Sure, goes on all the time.  Maybe a piece of me's in you now, who knows.  But when you die - really die - that's a big return ticket.

Lootenant, they're kickin our ass, they know we're gonna bring heavy shit on 'em pretty soon so they're gonna get in tight under the arty.  I spotted a cut running around to the left.  Lemme take some men and roll up that flank ..
next to the church.

Third Platoon's coming up the stream to reinforce us. Flank's wide open, dinks get 3-4 snipers in these holes, when Third Platoon comes up, they'll get us in a crossfire with 'em.  We'll shoot each other to shit, then they'll hit us with everything they got. It'll be a massacre!

Replies.Reply: Maybe but I seen it happen at Ia Drang in '66, First Cavalry and they cut us to fuckin' pieces!
Give me three men, if I'm wrong, I can still roll up that flank.
Move it!  Move it!
Stagger yourselves across this line, shoot anything that moves.  They'll be coming from here.
One of them gets through it's curtains.
Down along the river 'bout 100 metres, 'case they try to flank us there.  Third Platoon's coming up on our rear so watch for 'em.
Elias, his pack stripped, is gone, like a fleet leaf, vanishing into the Jungle.
You're a sick mother Bunny.
Hey Taylor, what's in the breeze?
Shit, too bad we in base camp anyway.
Yeah, just stole me some from the Top's supply but he's stealing it from us anyway.
Chucks are coming.  You better 'didi' man.
Forty-two days man and a wakeup and I'm a gone motherfucker.  Back to de WORLD.
Let's see three hundred and WHAT?
You WHAT?  Say 'gain.
You a crazy fucker, givin' up college man.
What we got here a crusader?
Sheeit, gotta be rich in the first place to think like dat.  Everybody know the poor always being fucked by the rich.  Always have, always will.
You okay man?  Neck botherin' you?
Here have some of this.  Won't feel a thing.
Dat's what they all say.
Fuck it, don't mean nothing, no such thing here as a coward, done your best man, next time y'do better.
Yo getting there Taylor.  You be cool now and I'll introduce you 'round to some of the 'heads'.
Daisy Mae Highway, that's what.
Well whatcha want, Lerner, your dick been limp for a year, 'cept when you're bopping your buddy Tony up there.
And?
Merle?
Dawn?
Whew! - where that come from?
Yeah, you done said it.  Revenge on US.
Love, yeah!
Yeah, get married to some crazy El Lay bitch, an actress or somethin', she blew all his bread - LSD, gurus, all that California shit, and then she turns him into the cops on a drug rap.
So he got a reduced and come over here.  Nam's his freedom man, Nam's his pussy.  Three years he been here.
Well sometimes a man jes don' wanna go back.  How you gonna talk to civilians man?  People back in the world just don't give a shit, y'know what I mean, to them you're a fuckin' animal is all -
Yeah, big boy, thought you had that laundry gig all laid out?
Gonna be a rabbi man?
Your girlfriends gonna look for new lovers, man. Best thing a bro's got's his flap.
WATCH OUT!  ROCKET!
Man, you gonna be in Japan this time tomorrow, Big Harold.
I go with dat, an eye for an eye man.
Then you jes gonna forget 'bout Elias and all the good times we done had?  Right in here.
Right on.
Girl?
Must be somebody?
Way out of anything, man.  Just keep your pecker up, your powder dry, the worm WILL turn.  How many days you short?
Does a chicken have lips?  Whoever said we did, babe. Make it outta here, it's all gravy, every day of the rest of your life man - gravy.  Oh shit, superlifer!
O'NEILL Collect your shit and move out King.  You got 10 minutes make the last chopper.  Cee ess em oh or your ass is mine.
Francis is coming over.
King packing up, double time.  Chris comes over, helps him, trying to share his happiness but not succeeding.
Shit, King, it ain't d-e-r-e man, it's d-e-a-r, and Sara don't have no two r's in it, fool.  Shame on you.
Politics, man, politics.  We always getting fucked around here.
Shit I blew my claymore right in one dude's face and I seen him walking around afterwards.
How much she weigh man?
Daisy Mae what?
Sure.
Hey man didn't you say she had black hair?
Hey take it easy man.  They're scared.
Let's get out of here man.
Hey Big Harold, put dat in your turkey loaf it won't come out your back end.
Gonna cut your pecker down to size hunh Big Harold?
You gonna get some for me back in the World, Harold? Whatcha gonna do?
Out there man - behind the log.
How you figger that?
Oh shit me I wish I was back in Memphis now, oooh baby this is gonna be a motherfucker!
Come on man!
Back there.
Taylor, let's di-di man!
YAAAAAHHHH!!!!  KILLLLL!!!
Hey Taylor, you okay man?
Jes' fine man, jes fine!  Ain't never felt better! Both of us two timers man, we're out.
The Medic points to the chopper.
Mumm, any time sweetheart.
And Baaaaaaa! back on you.
I didn't like it.
Shit.  Sold me out for some lame dude with a 4-F.
Daisy Mae.
She look beautiful.
Fuck that.
You can plant that shit in Tennessee man, but it won't come up in Texas.
Susan?
He says he was hit in a bombing raid.
He says they had no choice.  The NVA killed the old honcho when he said no.  He says the rice is theirs.
They don't know Sarge, they don't know!

Barnes turns his attention on the other villagers, his intentions apparent.  Everybody feels them.  They're next.  Barnes is unperturbed, very much in command of the situation, no rage, no emotions expressed.
Tennessee someplace.  Hill country.
Does a pee wee wanna take a wee wee?
Well he ain't normal that's fosure.
Here we go again with the crazy preacher stuff.  Rhah seen too many movies.

Sky Six reports a fresh company of NVA moving across from Cambodia to this blue line.
Hey Big Harold, gimme your peaches for the fruitcake man.
C'mon man, didn't I do you right that time I give you the turkey loaf for the ham and lima beans shit.
Youse a pig man.  I hope Manny get dat laundry gig for' you do.
Hey Taylor, you don't know it but I saved your ass today.  I killed a shit-eating dog.
You gonna wipe your ass dis time?
DOC! GET UP HERE! TEX IS HIT!
Oh shit, Doc he's hit too.
That dumb fuck didn't blow his claymore!
He let'em walk right up on us.  He was sleeping on his shift.
Don babytalk him man.  Cocksucker fell asleep.  They walked right up on us, he don do shit.
Let de white boy carry his ass, he this dude that got him fucked up.  Who'd be hauling his ass if that was a brother laying there?
Fuck that redneck noise, dude.  All dem chicks be rappin' how dey losin' der' ho's and how dey ain't got no bread for beer.  Fuck dat honky shit.  Got to get me some motown jams, dig it?
Das right dude.  You be tryin' to string de black man out on dat shit and keep him DOWN.  Time's be coming, my man, when de black man's gonna throw off that yoke.
Don you worry Bunny, youse a killer anyway.
Youse so fucked up man.
Yeah, you had a piece of pussy on a plate in front of you, you'd probably kill it.
Sure, you probably stick it in tween her knees and think youse there.
Only way you'd get some pussy is your bitch dies and wills it to you - and then maybe.
He's lying through his teeth!
Shit I hope so!

DEN COURTMARTIAL ME MOTHERFUCKAH, bust my ass, send me to fucking Long Binh, do your worst but I ain't walking no more.  De white man done got his last klik outta me.  Get some chuck dude to hump this shit.
No!  Wait!  I'll walk, fuck you I'll walk, I don't need this shit!  I don't need this shit!
Fuck! I gotta be on this hole with YOU man.  I just know I shouldna come!
Fuck this shit!  I ain't dyin' in no white man's war! Ise didi-ing this motherfuckah!
Fuck you bitch.
Tricky bitch, reason you gimme dat turkey loaf is nobody else can eat that shit 'cept me so don't start your game playing with me Junior.
De fool think he's gonna get it but he ain't known for his thinking.
That reminds me, I gotta take a shit.
Yeah if you let me have your shirt.
You gonna be okay Taylor, okay, don't you start worrying now.

Bullshit man, you gettin outta the field, man.  Three hots a day, white sheets, dem pretty white nurses give you blowjobs too you pay em enough, I heard tell bout dem white bitches.  Better save yo strength Taylor.
Shaddup bitch.
Hey look at Charlotte!
She braid her hair under her armpits, Crutcher.
What dat?
Please, somebody hold my dick!
Inga?
Shit, got to paint myself white get one of dem jobs. Get ma request in for a circumcision.
Dat's okay wid me, better to have a small one den no one at all.
Short round!  It's short, man!  They fuckin' got Fu Sheng!  BARNES! OVER HERE!
Eat ma shit, you motherfuckers!
Jesus.
Who do you want on ambush, Sergeant?
Need anything?
How's it going Red?
O'NEILL Shit, cocksucker's got all the cards tonight.
Looks like you're doing all right Sergeant.
Catch you men later.  Enjoy yourselves.
Alright, Six says torch this place!  Blow the weapons in place.  Round up all suspected Vee Cees and shake it up!  We ain't got much light left.
What are you talking about!
No I don't.  I don't know what the fuck you're talking about, Elias!
Who wants to be reminded?  A silence of shame.  The Men moving away, Warren, Ace, Tony, Rodriguez, Barnes looking back once, a cold glare.
Fuckin' A!
Sounds pretty far out to me 'Lias.
What about Elias?  We pull back they'll be cut off. He needs cover fire.
MOVE IT MOVE IT MOVE IT.
Jackson, looks like you got Elias' squad now.
I don't want to hear your problems, Jackson.  You'll get new men any day.  Time being you make do like everybody else.
I don't want to hear about it Jackson.
This is one time we could sure use Elias.
Get me Six!
Where's Barnes!
We've been overrun Captain, we're pulling back. Over!
Shit, looks like rain.  All night too.  Gonna grow mushrooms in your bad-ass crotch Junior.
Damn, 'Lias this gun's boss.  Put Taylor someplace else.
Taylor, you're on.
You sure you know how to work the claymore?
Sin Loi.
THE CLAYMORE!  GET THOSE FUCKERS!
Feed me!
AAAAAGHHH! MY ARM! MY ARM!
MY ARM! JESUS FUCKING CHRIST!
What's O'Neill have a nose up the lieutenant's ass already, how come we always get ambush.
Oh man!  Sorry bout that.  I can't even remember when I was 332.  You gotta count backwards like you got 40 days in - think positive.
You volunteered for this shit man?
Sounds like it.
Kills the smell of shit anyway.
History, man, history.
So what she got, hair on her tits.
Jesus!

MEDIC!!  DOC!  DOC!

Shut your face chicken shit!  You in big trouble boy!
Listen to that shit, that's good shit!
Whaddaya talking shit for man.  Hey Junior!  Y'ever smoke any shit?
Say I can dig it.  Smoke that shit everything kinda gets weird y'know?
Yeah but I still like a piece of pussy once in a while - ain't nothing like a piece of pussy cept maybe the Indie 500.

Shit, I bet I been laid more'n you have.
Yeah?
Hey pig, pig - come here, pig, pig.
Hey look at this! Ma and Pa Kettle here.  Look at them - greasy gook motherfuckers!
Do 'em man, do 'em.
You chickenshit man, they're laughing at you, look at them faces.  That's the way a gook laughs.

Yeah sure you are, you're real sorry ain't you. You're just crying out your hearts about Sandy and Sal and Manny - they're laughing at us!  Their family is out there in the fucking bush blowing us away and they're laughing at us!
Fucker!
That's for Sandy!  And this is for Sal!  And this is for fucking Manny!  This is for me!
Betcha the old bitch runs the whole show.  Probably helped cut Manny's throat.  Probably cut my balls off if she could.
Come on, man, let's do her.

Satchel charge!  GET DOWN!
Fucking pussy, fuck it Sarge, I gotta have him on my hole?

What we fighting here, vampires?
She look huge and got freckles on her ass.

Dat's dat.
Tamara?

Have some Kentucky windage Lieutenant.
Wolfe takes a nip.
Hey look at that.

You lame Taylor?
You lame or something?
Your shit's in the wind troop.  Baaaaah!
If you're gonna do it man, 'least do it right.
Baaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!
Bah, you're a child, Lerner.  Rhah don't waste time on you.
And living in Hawaii man?
Found it.  Growing in a garden.
I know Barnes six months and I'll tell ya something - that man is MEAN, red in his soul like a dick on a dog.
Barnes comes from Hell.
And the cocksucker SURVIVED - that's BAAAD man. That's his high, baby.  High on WAR!
Seven times!
Seven.

You mean he's crazy?  No more crazy'n the rest of us been out in the bush too long.
Baaa, got no time to go to the movies.  Love and Hate too busy fighting for possession of my soul.
'Lias come naturally.
Not the only man to meet his Jezebel either.

Gotcha.

Taylor!

Shit man - Human nature.
He dugged his own grave.
He DUGGED it too.

You guys trying to cure the headache by cutting off the head.  'Lias didn't ask you to fight his battles and if there's a Heaven - and god, I hope so - I know he's sitting up there drunk as a fuckin' monkey and smokin' shit cause HIS PAINS HE DONE LEFT DOWN HERE. Baaaaaaaaa!
I remember first time you came in here Taylor you telling me how much you admired that bastard.
EASY BARNES, EASY MAN!!!

Squad?  I didn't know we was still referring to this platoon in terms of squads sir.
You don't want to hear about it?
Taylor!  Francis!

Connie?
Good sir.
No sir.

Leave it willya - it's gook shit.

What the fuck you want - she's a dink.

Don't drink that asshole.  You're gonna get malaria.

Hey Sarge can we get in on this.

On the edge of the perimeter, King puts out his claymore, unraveling it back towards his FOXHOLE, intersecting MEN form the Third Platoon, who file out on a night ambush, skirting the trip wires, demoralized, silent.  Eye exchanges, but no words.
Negative contact.  Can't raise Barnes, Two Bravo, Two Charlie, nothin'!
It's Doc!
Six!
You're an asshole Lieutenant, you know that.
Shit, lookit this little fucker trying to get up ma glory hole.
I'll drink to your flap in Chicago, King.  All I gotta do is stretch it out to 15 days and I'll be short 15 and the Beast just wouldn't dare send me back to the bush.
Rog, Two Bravo.  Solid copy, stand by for shot, out.
How do you know the dinks didn't get him.  You got no proof man.
We're pinned down sir, they're in the fucking trees! The trees -
Lieutenant's dead sir, radioman look dead sir, I don't know where the map is Captain!  They're all around us sir.  They're moving!  Hundreds of em!  I can hear em talking gook!!!  Jesus Christ!
Got a light?
DON'T SHOOT!  DON'T SHOOT!
Water!  Water!
They'se all over the place, hundreds of em moving this way!  They wiped us out man, we didn't have a chance!  Where's the CP?
You guys get outta here!  They're right on my ass and they ain't stoppin' for shit!
Get me Bravo!
Okay move two squads from Alpha down there.  Where's that goddamn air strike, you bet your ass if we were the First Cav they'd be here now.
Replies.Didascalie: (looks at his watch, to his XO)

Replies.Reply: Bravo Six sir.
Diiiiikaaeeeeeee!
Chris bellies into the area, see Barnes, recognizes him, amazed.
Bozo!  Get back here!
Can you walk outta here?
- 37 U.S. KIA, 122 wounded and still counting. Estimate 500 Victor Charlie KIA, 22 wounded and still counting.  Over.
That's your ride man, you ready?
